word: We are all the property of the Lord Jesus. He gave His life as a ransom to redeem us. By His gift every family--father, mother, and children--may be saved. My sister, will you neglect your home duties by not putting to tax your God-given power of will in an effort to help your children?  In the name of the Lord, I charge you to make every effort, with your husband's help, to save your children.
